taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section arguti;species louisianus;

treatment.description: Differing from no. 168 in the very fine teeth of the primocane-leaflets, these only 2-3 mm. long; simple blades and terminal leaflets of bracteal leaves only one-third as broad as long; fruit amber-white.
